description: Refactor QboClientService to use an internal REST transport abstraction instead of node-quickbooks instance methods.
Implement QBO base URL/environment resolution for sandbox vs production requests in the REST path.
Implement REST query execution for SELECT statements and preserve current entity-array extraction behavior.
Implement CompanyInfo retrieval via REST endpoint and keep query("...CompanyInfo...") behavior equivalent.
Implement generic create(entityType, data) over REST while preserving current return shape expectations.
Implement generic update(entityType, data) over REST with Id/SyncToken validation and update operation semantics.
Implement generic read(entityType, id) over REST and preserve not-found to null behavior.
Preserve one-time token refresh and retry behavior for 401 responses in the REST request path.
Preserve mapQboError output compatibility and AppError code mappings used by existing consumers.
Keep findCustomerByDisplayName query escaping behavior equivalent to current implementation.
Keep createOrUpdateCustomer flow behavior equivalent, including SyncToken fetch fallback before updates.
Keep tenant secret storage contract unchanged for refreshed tokens and multi-realm credential map updates.
Ensure qboActions usage continues to compile and run without call-site signature changes.
Ensure QuickBooksOnlineCompanyAdapter customer sync flow remains compatible with QboClientService changes.
Remove dynamic import and runtime construction of node-quickbooks client from qboClientService.
Remove node-quickbooks from packages/integrations/package.json dependencies.
Refresh lockfile to remove node-quickbooks and its transitive request-based dependency chain.
Add focused unit coverage for query and CompanyInfo REST paths in qboClientService.
Add focused unit coverage for create/update/read REST paths and error mapping behavior.
Add focused unit coverage for token refresh retry behavior on 401 responses.
Add focused unit coverage for customer lookup/create/update upsert behavior including SyncToken fallback.
Run targeted integration package tests for QBO-related flows after migration changes.
Run dependency audit checks and confirm security warning reduction tied to node-quickbooks removal.
Document migration assumptions, commands, and package evidence in SCRATCHPAD.md for implementation handoff.
